page.title: 07INDUSTRIAL CARLISLE
page.content: The first major industries in the area involved textiles.In the 18th century,spinning was a cottage industry in the villages outside the city,and the larger works grew up in the 19th century.Much of the city's industrial development was concentr- ated in Caldewgate.Now,Caldewgate is a small area but very noisy.There are a lot of factories,like the milk processing plant.About 100 metres from our house there is a scrapyard and it has a giant electromagnet and 500 metres away is the United Biscuits fac tory.Now that the summer has come there is a lot more traffic and the road that leads onto the A74 at the main roundabout passes through Caldewgate and causes a lot of noise.
